GSD.description:
hfs: fix OOB Read in __hfs_brec_find

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 8c40f2dbae603ef0bd21e87c63f54ec59fd88256. For more details please see the references link.
